entries: Nov 3 - You're the softness that wears my edges down to something kind.
Nov 7 - I watch you exist and feel like the world finally makes narrative sense.
Nov 10 - You're my quiet revolution, my truce with every ache.
Nov 12 - I hope you never forget this: you are my calm, my ache, my reason.
content.closing: You're my calm, my ache, my reason. Slayer of my heart, keeper of my peace.
